title.value: Влияние интенсивных технологий и стронгилоидов на гомеостаз свиней и его коррекция
Influence of intensive technologies and strongyloides on homeostasis of pigs and its correction

organization.name: Vitebsk State Academy of Veterinary Medicine

person.name: Samsonovich, V.A., Vitebsk State Academy of Veterinary Medicine (Belarus)

abstract.value: In course of the research there were studied the influence of intensive technologies and strongyloides on homeostasis of pigs and its correction. The research was realized in the conditions of the Vitebsk State Academy of Veterinary Medicine in the Republic of Belarus. As a result of realized research there were revealed indicators of adaptive-immune processes in pigs of different ages in ontogeny under the influence of intensive technologies, strongyloides and antiparasitic agents. Dynamics of natural resistance and immune processes in pigs of different ages in the animal industry, the content of thyroid hormones in pigs of different age groups, the age dynamics of the metabolism of proteins, lipids, carbohydrates, micro-and macro-elements in pigs, the enzymatic activity and the content of the mucous membranes of the gastrointestinal tract in pigs of different age groups, epizootological monitoring strongyloidiasis in different types of pig farms, the adaptive-immune processes in the body of pigs under the influence of strongyloides, the impact on strongyloides on immune-morphology response and pathological reactions in the body of pigs were presented.
